questions.quote: Never! You hate him because he's doing more with your name than you ever will! Yah-yah!
Listen, there is something really suspicious about this guy. Every time Mr Peterman tries to assign him any work, he says he can't hear, and it all gets dumped on me.
Awright already!! This is a very key issue with me, Jerry. I had this name for a long time.
You don't understand. I can't allow my son to pay for me. Look, as soon as I get back to Florida, I promise you I'll mail you a check.
And you know what else I've decided to do? I'm going to keep seeing the bald woman.
There was something so reassuring about that cozy little space.
If I get it for you, will you take me to that club an' show me a good time?
You know, it's a funny thing, because after the pilot got cancelled, we hadn't heard from you.
You know what? You're right. These reports, they can wait a couple of hours. Whadda say we go out tonight? Any place you want.
I think that's a "what's good for the goose is good for the gander".
